name: Potato Crunchy Tenders
author: beccalynn
summary: I was trying to come up with something different than pizza on football practice nights, so i came up with this quick meal.
ingredients: ½ cup vegetable oil for frying
1 (7.6 ounce) package garlic flavored instant mashed potatoes
directions: Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium heat
While the oil is heating, beat the milk and egg together in a bowl
In another bowl, stir together the instant mashed potatoes, salt, and pepper
Stir the chicken tenders with the milk mixture to coat thoroughly, then shake off excess milk and dip each tender into the potato flakes
Place the breaded tenders into the hot oil, and fry until golden brown, 7 to 10 minutes
Remove from oil and drain on paper towels
